lyric:
[00:00.000] 作词 : Christian F J Buettner/Maisy Kendrick
[00:00.226] 作曲 : Christian F J Buettner/Maisy Kendrick
[00:00.453]Za'u oe fru iknimaya
[00:02.800]Nìftxavang ting mikyun ting nari
[00:05.312]Tompayä kato tsawkeyä kato
[00:07.948]Sì'ekong te'lanä oeru teya si
[00:10.549]Za'u oe fru iknimaya
[00:12.998]Nìftxavang ting mikyun ting nari
[00:15.479]Tompayä kato tsawkeyä kato
[00:18.072]Sì'ekong te'lanä oeru teya si
[00:20.708]Za'u oe fru iknimaya
[00:23.092]Nìftxavang ting mikyun ting nari
[00:25.676]Tompayä kato tsawkeyä kato
[00:28.246]Sì'ekong te'lanä oeru teya si
[00:30.824]Za'u oe fru iknimaya
[00:33.343]Nìftxavang ting mikyun ting nari
[00:35.897]Tompayä kato tsawkeyä kato
[00:38.498]Sì'ekong te'lanä oeru teya si
[01:02.111]I found a light inside me
[01:04.199]I wanna let it glow
[01:06.788]Keep shining bright beside me
[01:09.299]Follow where I go
[01:11.955]So when the thunder comes and
[01:14.462]The storm becomes the night
[01:17.171]I'll guide you through the lightning
[01:19.423]Stay close by my side
[01:22.291]Za'u oe fru iknimaya
[01:24.442]Nìftxavang ting mikyun ting nari
[01:27.008]Tompayä kato tsawkeyä kato
[01:29.570]Sì'ekong te'lanä oeru teya si
[01:32.055]Za'u oe fru iknimaya
[01:34.702]Nìftxavang ting mikyun ting nari
[01:37.221]Tompayä kato tsawkeyä kato
[01:39.768]Sì'ekong te'lanä oeru teya si
[02:02.888]I found a light inside me
[02:05.406]I wanna let it glow
[02:08.083]Keep shining bright beside me
[02:10.565]Follow where I go
[02:13.220]So when the thunder comes and
[02:15.736]The storm becomes the night
[02:18.268]I'll guide you through the lightning
[02:20.704]Stay close by my side
[02:24.888]Up in the clouds I found my voice
[02:29.858]Up past the shouts and broken noise
[02:34.472]So don't let me fall where I don't belong
[02:39.863]I can't go back and lose it all
tlyric:
[by:番茄茄茄茄酱酱]
[00:00.453]我从阶梯来到天堂
[00:02.800]全心全意的倾听吧
[00:05.312]这雨与阳光的旋律
[00:07.948]我的心怦怦直跳
[00:10.549]我从阶梯来到天堂
[00:12.998]用心的倾听吧
[00:15.479]这雨与阳光的旋律
[00:18.072]我的心在怦怦跳动
[00:20.708]我从阶梯来到天堂
[00:23.092]用心的倾听吧
[00:25.676]这阳光与雨的节奏
[00:28.246]我的心在怦怦跳动
[00:30.824]我从阶梯来到天堂
[00:33.343]利用所有感官
[00:35.897]感受这阳光与雨的节奏
[00:38.498]我的心无法停止
[01:02.111]我心散发一道光
[01:04.199]我将让它变得更亮
[01:06.788]驱散我周围的黑暗
[01:09.299]跟着我吧
[01:11.955]当夜晚雷声轰鸣
[01:14.462]风暴来临之时
[01:17.171]我将是你的指路明灯
[01:19.423]靠近我吧
[01:22.291]我从阶梯来到天堂
[01:24.442]用心的聆听吧
[01:27.008]这雨与阳光的节奏
[01:29.570]我的心在砰砰跳动
[01:32.055]我从阶梯来到天堂
[01:34.702]用心的感受吧
[01:37.221]这雨与阳光的旋律
[01:39.768]我心永不停歇
[02:02.888]我心散发一束光
[02:05.406]我将让它变得更亮
[02:08.083]驱散我周围的黑暗
[02:10.565]跟着我吧
[02:13.220]当夜晚雷电交加
[02:15.736]暴风雨来临之时
[02:18.268]我将是你的指路明灯
[02:20.704]靠紧我吧
[02:24.888]我在苍穹中寻到了我的声音
[02:29.858]过去那嘶吼和破碎的声音
[02:34.472]所以不要让我倒在不属于我的地方
[02:39.863]我不能丢掉这一切
